data.title: Office of the Communications Authority
data.text:
Fixed Network Operators

Hong Kong’s telecommunications market has been fully liberalised and there is no pre-set limit on the number of licences issued for the provision of local fixed services. The full list of licensed network operators which provide local fixed services can be found at here.

You may approach the fixed network operators direct for details about their network coverage and service offerings, and choose the one which best suits your needs. The hotline numbers and web sites of some of the local fixed network operators are listed below (in alphabetical order) for your reference:

Mobile Network Operators

There are a total of 4 mobile network service operators providing mobile service in Hong Kong. You may approach them direct for details about their services and choose the one which best suits your needs. Following are their contact information for your reference:

China Mobile Hong Kong Company Limited

Hotline: 12580

Hong Kong Telecommunications (HKT) Limited

Hotline: 2512 3123 (for "csl." customers)

Hotline: 2888 1010 (for "1010" customers)

Hutchison Telephone Company Limited ("3")

Hotline: 1033

SmarTone Mobile Communications Limited

Hotline: 2880 2688

In addition, mobile virtual network operators may also provide mobile service, please click here for names of licensees.
